home.add-device.click-below: Click the button below to install to this computer.
home.add-device.instructions.download: Download the installer to re-install Sophos Home on one of your existing devices.
home.add-device.instructions.shareable: 複製下方連結並將其傳送至您想要保護的所有電腦。
home.add-device.legal.canada: By clicking “{{ buttonLabel }}”, you (i) consent to installation of Sophos Home software and automatic updates or upgrades to the software, (ii) acknowledge that Sophos collects and processes personal data as described in the Privacy Policy, (iii) your device will communicate with Sophos automatically, (iv) the software may affect settings, preferences, commands, and data stored on your device, and (v) you have read, understood and accepted the Sophos End User Licence Agreement. You can withdraw consent at any time by uninstalling the software.
home.add-device.legal.global: By clicking ”{{ buttonLabel }}”, (i) you acknowledge that Sophos will process your personal data as described in the Privacy Policy, and (ii) you confirm you have read, understood, and accepted the Sophos End User Licence Agreement.
home.add-device.legal.help: For assistance, contact Sophos Ltd, The Pentagon, Abingdon Science Park, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, OX14 3YP, UK, www.sophos.com.
home.add-device.modal.enrollment.title: Email Installation Link
To send the link to an additional recipient, enter it below.
To send the link to multiple additional recipients, enter the email addresses separated by semicolon. For example: alice@mail.com; bob@mail.com; charlie@mail.com
You can also copy the link below
The installation link will be sent to:
Failed to send the email to:
Remember to check your spam folder in case you don’t see it in your inbox.
An email with the installation link has been sent to:
home.add-device.plusdevice.description: You can protect up to {{ deviceLimit }} devices with your Sophos Home account and you have reached this limit. To remove computers, go to the Device page for the device you want to remove and click 'Remove' below the device name.
home.add-device.plusdevice.title: 已達到裝置限制

home.config.global_exclusions.descriptio: Below are the applications you've chosen to exclude from ransomware protection.

home.config.global_exclusions.title: Global Scanning Exclusions
home.config.modal.delete-device.body: 確定要移除此裝置？此裝置無法再從您的 Sophos 首頁帳戶控管，且安裝於此裝置的 Sophos 首頁軟體將繼續執行，直到您解除安裝為止。
home.config.modal.delete-device.title: 移除裝置
home.config.modal.global-exclusions.body: We detected an application behaving suspiciously. If you'd like us to stop reporting this activity, add it to your Global Exclusions by clicking the 'Add' button below.
home.config.modal.leave-trial.body: Are you sure that you wish to opt-out of the Sophos Home Premium Trial? All premium features will be disabled, and you will not be able to revert back to the trial.
home.config.modal.leave-trial.title: Leave Sophos Home Premium Trial
home.config.modal.mtd.body: We detected an application behaving suspiciously. Let us know if you think this is wrong by clicking the 'Report' button below.
home.config.modal.mtd.title: Help us improve things...
We've detected this application as being malicious. Only allow this application if you are confident it is not a threat.
We detected an application behaving suspiciously. If you'd like to allow this activity in the future, add an exclusion by clicking one of the buttons below.
We detected an application behaving suspiciously. Only allow this behaviour if you are confident it is not a threat.
home.config.modal.whitelist.process-name: By clicking 'Allow Behavior', an exclusion will be added to allow this behavior in the future.
home.config.modal.whitelist.runtime_dete: By clicking 'Allow application path', an exclusion will be added to allow this behavior in the future.
home.config.recommended.desc.normal._dyn: You are protected against known malware and unwanted applications.
Protects your privacy by alerting to unwanted use of your webcam.
You will be alerted if you privacy is compromised.
You are protected against advanced threats to your computer.
You are protected against ransomware attacks.
Block browsing to the categories of websites you choose.
Block browsing to the categories of websites that are known to contain malware.
home.config.recommended.desc.warning._dy: Some antivirus protection features have been disabled. We recommended you enable all protection features for maximum security.
Some privacy protection are disabled. Enable to be alerted to unwanted use of your webcam.
Some advanced protection features have been disabled. We recommended you enable all protection features for maximum security.
Some advanced protection features have been disabled. We recommended you enable all protection features for maximum security.
Some web protection features have been disabled. We recommended you enable all protection features for maximum security.

home.config.v2.intercept.group.exploit.d: Alerts you when application exploits are detected.

home.config.v2.intercept.group.microphon: Alerts you when your microphone has been hacked.

home.config.v2.intercept.group.wipeguard: Stops ransomware destroying your storage configuration.

home.dashboard.subtitle: Your device security at a glance
home.dashboard.title: Dashboard
home.device-security-settings.subtitle: Below are the current security settings for your Android device. For highest security, we recommend having a High Security Setting (green checkmark) for each setting. Learn more
home.device-security-settings.title: Device Security Settings
home.device.location.marker.title: Device Located
home.device.location.title: Location
home.device.modal.lock.body: The device will display a lock screen. If a password has been set, the user needs to enter it in order to use the device again.
home.device.modal.lock.title: Lock Device
home.device.modal.remotescan.body: 掃描可能要花很長時間。若電腦離線，則會在其恢復上線時進行掃描。
home.device.modal.remotescan.title: Scan Device
home.device.modal.reset-passcode-in-prog: The passcode reset is in progress. Please wait for us to get the new temporary passcode for you.
home.device.modal.reset-passcode.body: This will allow the user to unlock the Android device by using a new password. Click Reset to generate a new unlock password for device.
home.device.modal.reset-passcode.title: Reset Passcode
home.device.modal.reset-pin.request-sent: Please check your email for the temporary PIN, and follow the instructions to secure the device with a new PIN of your choice.
home.device.modal.reset-pin.send-to-addi: To send the temporary PIN to an additional recipient, enter it below.
home.device.modal.reset-pin.send-to-prim: The temporary PIN will be sent to:
home.device.modal.reset-pin.text1: This will send an email with an automatically temporary PIN to unlock your device.
home.device.modal.reset-pin.text2: *After the reset, your current PIN can no longer be used, and you must use the temporary PIN to unlock your device. This action cannot be undone.*
home.device.modal.reset-pin.text3: Are you sure you want to do this?
home.device.modal.reset-pin.title: Reset PIN
home.device.modal.show-passcode.body: The temporary passcode is: {{ tempPasscode }}. Click Email to send it to your email address.
home.device.modal.show-passcode.title: Temporary Passcode
home.device.modal.wipe.request-sent.text: If your device is online, the factory reset process will begin shortly.
Please note, since this action erases all of your app data, you will need to download the Sophos Mobile Security app on your device and add it to Sophos Home again.
home.device.modal.wipe.text1: This will send a wipe request to your device. If your device is on, it will be reset to its original factory settings.
home.device.modal.wipe.text2: *Your current apps, settings and data will be lost - this action cannot be undone.*
home.device.modal.wipe.text3: Are you sure you want to do this?
home.device.modal.wipe.title: Wipe Device
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.b: 藍牙允許進行短距離的無線資料傳輸。為保持控制您的資料，請僅在需要時啟用藍牙。傳輸完成後，立即停用藍牙。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.d: 此裝置支援裝置加密。啟用裝置加密可確保在裝置遺失或被盜時，無人可以存取您的資料。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.n: NFC 允許在公釐範圍內與其他裝置進行非接觸式資料傳輸。為保持控制您的資料，請僅在需要時啟用 NFC。傳輸完成後，立即停用 NFC。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.o: 作業系統安全修補程式等級
Android 每月會發佈安全更新，以保持使用者安全。檢查所安裝裝置的系統更新。請注意：一些廠商並非每月發佈安全更新。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.r: 此裝置已加密。但是，您還應該在螢幕鎖定設定中選取「需要 PIN/密碼來啟動裝置」。這可以確保在裝置遺失或被盜時，無人可以存取您的資料。
如果裝置被刷機，應用程式可能會獲得完全管理權限，從而在您不知情的情況下執行可能具有危險的工作，例如刪除和變更檔案。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.s: 透過螢幕鎖定確保您的裝置受保護。我們建議您同時選取「需要 PIN/密碼來啟動裝置」。這可以確保在裝置遺失或被盜時，無人可以存取您的私人資料。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.u: 通常，應用程式僅可從 Google Play Store 安裝。如果您變更此設定，則可以從任何位置（如其他網站），或從裝置的本機存放裝置安裝應用程式。僅從 Google Play Store 安裝應用程式可降低下載及安裝惡意應用程式的風險。
如果偵錯已啟用，則您的裝置可以由 ADB（Android 偵錯橋）透過 USB 操作。可以在無需關注的情況下安裝和刪除應用程式，操作檔案及變更系統設定。最終，可以在裝置上打開命令殼層。
home.device.statuses.warning._dynamic_.w: Wi-Fi 網路可讓您的裝置無線連接到其他電腦或網際網路。如果您設定的 Wi-Fi 網路没有安全性或安全性較差，則該裝置不僅會自动連接到具有您設定的名稱的 Wi-Fi 網路，還會連接至名稱相同的惡意網路，该網路也被称为蜜罐未授權存取點或雙面惡魔存取點。您的裝置將容易遭受所謂的 SSID 詐騙攻擊。因此，Sophos Mobile Security 指出無論是否使用 WEP 安全設定的 Wi-Fi 網路（無論是否現在連接）均為不安全。
home.elevate.locked: Account settings are locked until you re-enter your password.

home.getting-started.action.email.link: Email install link to protect another household computer
home.getting-started.content.intro: Sophos Home allows you to protect and manage multiple devices.
home.getting-started.instructions.androi: Already have the app? Configure this device now
Or sign in from your Android device.
Start now and configure your device. Once configured you can scan your phone in the background.
home.getting-started.instructions.help-l: Read our install help to get you started.
home.getting-started.instructions.mac: Download Sophos Home on to your Mac. Once installed you can scan your machine in the background.
home.getting-started.instructions.other: Download Sophos Home on to your device. Once installed you can scan and clean your machine.
home.getting-started.instructions.window: Download Sophos Home on to your PC. Once installed it will automatically scan and clean your machine.
Download Sophos Home on to your PC.

home.status-group.item._dynamic_.av.desc: Blocks known viruses, trojans, worms, and traditional threats.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.bank.de: Certified by MRG Effitas to protect browsers for online banking.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.cam-and: Alerts you to unwanted use of your webcam and mic.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.cam.des: Alerts you to unwanted use of your webcam.
Stops ransomware from encrypting your files.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.device-: Get advice on how to improve device security.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.loss-an: Turn on Location Services on your mobile device to activate full protection.
Remotely secure and protect your device in case of loss and theft.
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.pua.des: Protect against adware, spyware and other Potentially Unwanted Apps (PUA)
home.status-group.item._dynamic_.web.des: Blocks website categories you choose: gambling, hacking. ...
home.status-group.third-party-av: Sophos Home provides complete Anti-Virus protection. We noticed you also have {{ thirdPartyAVName }} on your computer. Running two anti-virus programs simultaneously creates possible conflict that could reduce your overall security. For maximum protection, we suggest you uninstall {{ thirdPartyAVName }}.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.av: Antivirus and Host Intrusion Prevention System that protects computers from unidentified viruses and suspicious behavior.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaBadUS: Blocks malicious USB devices that impersonate a keyboard.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaCrypt: Ransomware Protection for Windows File Sharing (SMB). Protect documents and files shared from your computer against remote ransomware attacks.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaDllHi: Prevent vulnerable applications from loading and executing a malicious DLL contained in the same folder as a data file opened by these programs. (Also known as DLL hijacking, DLL spoofing, DLL preloading, or binary planting.)
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaExplo: Block hostile code from exploiting current and future vulnerabilities in your browsers.
Block hostile code from exploiting current and future vulnerabilities in your Java applications.
Block hostile code from exploiting current and future vulnerabilities in your media applications.
Block hostile code from exploiting current and future vulnerabilities in your office applications.
Block hostile code from exploiting current and future vulnerabilities in your browser plugins.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaFlyou: Display notification when an application with Advanced protection starts.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaHollo: Block hostile code from using legitimate applications to hide on your device.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaKbdGu: Protects identity and passwords against keyloggers which can secretly record your keystrokes.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaNetwo: Block traffic sent through a back door created by legitimate or hostile applications on your computer.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaSafeB: Detect and warn when your web browser has been compromised.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.hmpaWindo: Show a colored border around applications with Advanced protection.
Automatically hide any window border notifications shortly after application is launched.
Show keyboard encryption in protected applications where Keyboard Guard is active.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.mtd: Malicious Traffic Detection monitors programs on your computer for connections to known bad URLs such as Command and Control servers.
home.tooltips.config._dynamic_.pua: Potentially Unwanted Applications (PUAs) are programs that may not be malicious but that you might not want on your computer, such as adware and spyware. Real-time PUA protections blocks the installation or running of these kinds of programs.
home.trial-starter.modal.description: You are now enrolled in the Sophos Home Premium Trial
home.trial-starter.modal.name: Welcome to the Sophos Home Premium Trial
